verbose_text: However, prolonged phosphorylation of signal transducer and activator of transcription 1, a protein of the IFN-I cascade, leads to microgliopathy [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], and overexpression of IFNbeta in the CNS, as occurs in ageing, induces an ageing related microglial phenotype that is associated with cognitive impairment [XREF_BIBR].
